long_description: The Bananagrams anagram game will drive you and your friends bananas! It requires no pencil, paper or board and provides educational family fun. Tiles are placed face down on a table, then players choose their tiles and race to create crosswords. Includes 144 tiles, instructions and banana-shaped carrying case.
short_description: The Bananagrams anagram game will drive you and your friends bananas! It requires no pencil, paper or board and provides educational family fun.
